name: Cinderella Slippers. Set of 4. Clear Plastic High Heel Pumps or Shoes
description:
Cinderella dreams DO come true (at least they do when you decorate with these fabulous "glass" slippers)! Perfect for weddings, bridal showers, birthday parties, altered art or as a decoration around your home. Use as is, or embellish them with glitter, sequins, flowers, ribbon and more!
~Set of 4
~Each shoe measures approx. 3 1/4" long, 2 1/4" high and 1" wide
~Clear plastic. These shoes are hard plastic, not flimsy
Please let me know if you have any questions or need larger quantities

name: Tessa-Ravishing Rosette Hair Clip/Pin in Unbleached Muslin.  So French!
description:
I love this Rosette because it matches everything! Hand-stitched with fabulous unbleached muslin fabric and embellished with a pearl/silver tone button. Includes a pin back AND hair clip. This pin is so versatile...wear it in your hair or dress up a purse, shirt, hat, jacket or belt!
Approx. Size: 3 3/4" in a diameter (hand-stitched so it may vary slightly)
Colors: beige-y/tan/khaki
Care: Spot clean only

Please contact me if you have any questions or would like larger quantities.
Have a fabulous day!
~Julie~

©Julie L. Light/Fabulous Finds Boutique

name: Dinner in Paris-Handmade recipe cards.  SEt of 6.  Parisian.  France.
description:
A fabulous set of vintage recipe cards!
These recipe cards are perfect for jotting down delicious recipes {especially for the Holidays} or use them for altered art projects: collage, scrapbooking, cards, gift tags and more. Perfect for gift giving, too.
~Recipe cards are hand-stamped with black ink and embellished with rhinestones
~Cards measure 4"x6"
~Set of 6
~Blank on the reverse side
~Tied with a white satin ribbon and embellished with a handmade tag {made with vintage book pages}
~Placed into a cellophane envelope prior to shipping
Please contact me if you have any questions or need larger quantities.

name: Francine-Versatile Stretch Lace Headband in Chic Black
description:
This romantic stretch lace headband is so versatile. Wear it with the knot showing or hide it underneath your hair. Fold it in half for a smaller headband.  Perfect for daytime or night time....
The details:
Slips over the head
Size: Approx. 19.5" x 3.75" wide (un-stretched)
Colors: pink
Care: Hand wash or machine wash in a lingerie bag on the delicate cycle. Lay flat to dry.
Comes professionally packaged, perfect for gift giving.

Please contact me if you have any questions or would like larger quantities.
Have a fabulous day!
~Julie~

©Julie L. Light/Fabulous Finds Boutique
